overview: As Vice President of Marketing, Patrick Barry manages the company’s product roadmap, customer experience and go-to-market strategy. Prior to joining Demandforce, Patrick spent 5 years at Yahoo, Inc., where he was Vice President of Product Management, developing emerging consumer experiences for the desktop, television and mobile devices. Before joining Yahoo!, Barry was an active venture investor in the areas of networking, consumer electronics and web services. Prior to that, he worked with numerous start-up technology companies, both as an operating executive and as a practicing corporate and securities lawyer. Patrick was born and raised in Silicon Valley. Patrick received his B.A. from Columbia University, and a J.D. from Hastings College of the Law.

relationships.title: VP Product Management, Connected TV Group
